situation.title: Which informations will I be supposed to enter when registering to the vaccination timeslot booking system?
situation.meta_description: An overview of informations needed to be provided when registering to the vaccination timeslot booking system

content.processed:
The scope of the informations required will differ according to the phase of the vaccination process. For the period starting from January 15, 2021 (or Phase IA) these are

  • Name and surname
  • Health insurance number
  • Health insurance carrier number
  • Permanent residence address
  • E-mail address (optional)
  • Telephone number
  • Preferred vaccination point
  • Age (80+ only)
  • Occupation (health workers only)

For the period starting in February/March (or Phase IB and II, the exact start date depends on availability of the vaccine) these are

  • Name and surname
  • Health insurance number
  • Health insurance carrier number
  • Permanent residence address
  • E-mail address (optional)
  • Telephone number
  • Preferred vaccination point
  • Age group
  • Occupation

In order for the vaccination point personnel to ensure your identity, you will have to provide your date of birth as well. For further details on personal data processing see the Data Protection Impact Assessment (in Czech only).
